item.title: BetterTouchTool as Window Manager
item.description: BetterTouchTool BetterTouchTool is a fantastic MacOS utility that can act as a window manager. It also lets you customize your trackpad and Touch Bar to an extreme degree. It is no longer a free application but does come with a 45-day free trial and a reasonable price tag. The easiest way to install BetterTouchTool is with Homebrew: brew cask install bettertouchtool Configuration After opening BetterTouchTool, hit the Gestures/Triggers button (with the animal paw icon) and then select Keyboard from the toolbar.
